function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of contagious diseases through tourism","Impact":"Substantial negative impact on the global economy, mortality rates, and tourism","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict health and safety measures, monitoring and regulating travel movements","Technologies":"Health screening technology, contact tracing apps, and real-time monitoring systems","People":"Tourists, travel industry workers, local residents in tourist destinations","Owner":"Government authorities, public health agencies, tourism organizations"},{"Description":"Increased travel anxiety due to the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Significant increase in travel anxiety in various countries","Mitigation":"Provision of accurate and up-to-date information on travel risks, implementation of health and safety protocols, and promoting confidence in travel","Technologies":"Communication platforms for sharing travel advisories, health information apps, and virtual reality tourism experiences","People":"Tourists, travel industry workers, international travel agencies","Owner":"Travel agencies, public health agencies, tourism organizations"},{"Description":"Economic damage to the global tourism market","Impact":"$22 billion in economic damage to the global tourism market","Mitigation":"Adoption of flexible cancellation policies, promotion of domestic tourism, and investment in virtual tourism experiences","Technologies":"Online booking and cancellation systems, virtual reality tourism platforms, and digital marketing strategies","People":"Tourists, travel industry businesses, local communities dependent on tourism","Owner":"Government authorities, tourism boards, and tourism businesses"}]}
